tr.td: Do the next specification in parallel with this one (unless otherwise constrained by the following fields: TQ1-7-start date/time and TQ1-8-end date/time). The conjunction of "A" specifies two parallel instructions, as are sometimes used in medication, e.

It will be followed by a completion time for the service. This code allows one to distinguish between the time and priority at which a service should be actuated (e.g. blood should be drawn) and the time and priority at which a service should be complet
